mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.use_place_Id AS "usePlaceId", a.warehouse_name AS "warehouseName", a.manager_id AS "managerId", a.warehouse_type AS "warehouseType", a.high_temperature_alarm AS "highTemperatureAlarm", a.high_temperature_warning AS "highTemperatureWarning", a.low_temperature_warning AS "lowTemperatureWarning", a.low_temperature_alarm AS "lowTemperatureAlarm", a.high_humidity_alarm AS "highHumidityAlarm", a.high_humidity_warning AS "highHumidityWarning", a.low_humidity_warning AS "lowHumidityWarning", a.low_humidity_alarm AS "lowHumidityAlarm", a.warning_phone1 AS "warningPhone1", a.warning_phone2 AS "warningPhone2", a.warning_phone3 AS "warningPhone3", a.alarm_phone1 AS "alarmPhone1", a.alarm_phone2 AS "alarmPhone2", a.alarm_phone3 AS "alarmPhone3", a.measuer_period AS "measuerPeriod", a.warehouse_area AS "warehouseArea", a.outlet_num AS "outletNum", a.build_time AS "buildTime", a.construction_unit AS "constructionUnit", a.warehouse_plan AS "warehousePlan", a.warehouse_hight AS "warehouseHight", a.placement AS "placement", a.specification AS "specification", a.verification_unit AS "verificationUnit", a.verification_time AS "verificationTime", a.verification_report AS "verificationReport", a.department_id AS "departmentId", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_time AS "updateTime"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_bv_warehouse( id, use_place_Id, warehouse_name, manager_id, warehouse_type, high_temperature_alarm, high_temperature_warning, low_temperature_warning, low_temperature_alarm, high_humidity_alarm, high_humidity_warning, low_humidity_warning, low_humidity_alarm, warning_phone1, warning_phone2, warning_phone3, alarm_phone1, alarm_phone2, alarm_phone3, measuer_period, warehouse_area, outlet_num, build_time, construction_unit, warehouse_plan, warehouse_hight, placement, specification, verification_unit, verification_time, verification_report, department_id, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{usePlaceId}, #{warehouseName}, #{managerId}, #{warehouseType}, #{highTemperatureAlarm}, #{highTemperatureWarning}, #{lowTemperatureWarning}, #{lowTemperatureAlarm}, #{highHumidityAlarm}, #{highHumidityWarning}, #{lowHumidityWarning}, #{lowHumidityAlarm}, #{warningPhone1}, #{warningPhone2}, #{warningPhone3}, #{alarmPhone1}, #{alarmPhone2}, #{alarmPhone3}, #{measuerPeriod}, #{warehouseArea}, #{outletNum}, #{buildTime}, #{constructionUnit}, #{warehousePlan}, #{warehouseHight}, #{placement}, #{specification}, #{verificationUnit}, #{verificationTime}, #{verificationReport}, #{departmentId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_bv_warehouse SET use_place_Id = #{usePlaceId}, warehouse_name = #{warehouseName}, manager_id = #{managerId}, warehouse_type = #{warehouseType}, high_temperature_alarm = #{highTemperatureAlarm}, high_temperature_warning = #{highTemperatureWarning}, low_temperature_warning = #{lowTemperatureWarning}, low_temperature_alarm = #{lowTemperatureAlarm}, high_humidity_alarm = #{highHumidityAlarm}, high_humidity_warning = #{highHumidityWarning}, low_humidity_warning = #{lowHumidityWarning}, low_humidity_alarm = #{lowHumidityAlarm}, warning_phone1 = #{warningPhone1}, warning_phone2 = #{warningPhone2}, warning_phone3 = #{warningPhone3}, alarm_phone1 = #{alarmPhone1}, alarm_phone2 = #{alarmPhone2}, alarm_phone3 = #{alarmPhone3}, measuer_period = #{measuerPeriod}, warehouse_area = #{warehouseArea}, outlet_num = #{outletNum}, build_time = #{buildTime}, construction_unit = #{constructionUnit}, warehouse_plan = #{warehousePlan}, warehouse_hight = #{warehouseHight}, placement = #{placement}, specification = #{specification}, verification_unit = #{verificationUnit}, verification_time = #{verificationTime}, verification_report = #{verificationReport}, department_id = #{departmentId}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
